responsibilities: Work with a creative team responsible for the bring-up of new hardware platforms (vehicles, sensors, compute) and for building a multi-platform software stack
Develop software and ML methods to accelerate performance improvement of new platforms in relation to existing mature platforms
Build evaluation tools and infrastructure to measure performance of new platforms in comparison to existing mature platforms
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on working with hardware platforms, developing software and ML methods, and building evaluation tools for performance measurement. Fine-tuning and customization of language models is not directly related to these responsibilities, as it involves training or fine-tuning large language models for domain-specific tasks, which is more aligned with software development for language processing rather than hardware platform performance.
